meanings.sent1: The underpropping of the bridge ensured its stability.
meanings.sent2: The underpropping of the building prevented it from collapsing.
meanings.sent3: The underpropping of the tree made it look like it had tiny legs holding it up.
meanings.sent4: Her kind words acted as the underpropping for his confidence.
meanings.sent5: The underpropping of the mountain with trees created a beautiful landscape.

meanings.sent1: The workers were underpropping the structure to make it stronger.
meanings.sent2: She underpropped the shelf to prevent it from falling.
meanings.sent3: The magician underpropped the table to make it seem like it was floating.
meanings.sent4: His encouragement underpropped her determination to succeed.
meanings.sent5: The vines underpropping the flowers added a touch of elegance to the garden.
